newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0805 CDT.
LIVE CATTLE - Off 0.100 to up 0.100 cent. See further fund rolling. Weaker beef should also weigh on nearby.
FEEDER CATTLE - Steady to off 0.100 cent. Reduced demand for feeders and corn futures seen higher.
LEAN HOGS - Off 0.100 to up 0.100 cent. See further fund rolling. Live prices look steady to lower but pork prices up.
PORK BELLIES - Up 0.200 to 0.400 cent. Stronger cash belly market and continued light pace of hog slaughter.
